pages.text: The Alligator Snapping Turtle is a semi-aquatic create. It can be found in the depths of the swamp. This creature will take a defensive position, it will attack anything that steps near it.$(br2)Sometimes, they drop a piece of Spiked Scute, you can use them to improve your Turtle Shell and make a $(l:patchouli:armors/spiked_turtle_shell)Spiked Turtle Shell$(/l).
